name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Proficient .NET Developer with over 10 years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, leveraging core technologies such as **.NET**, **C#**, and **Azure**. Skilled in developing secure, scalable, and maintainable applications following best practices in **RESTful** architecture and **Web API 2** development. Experienced in **Angular 19**, **JavaScript**, and **HTML5** for creating dynamic user interfaces. Strong focus on **Microservices** and **Multithreading**, ensuring optimal performance and efficient resource utilization. Adept in Agile methodologies to deliver projects on time while meeting compliance standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS.

Additionally, brings hands-on experience in Object Oriented Development, utilizing design principles such as SOLID and DRY. Proven track record in leading enterprise development projects, embedding innovative solutions that are technically sound and drive real-world impact.

• Developed dynamic web applications with emphasis on **Angular 19** and **JavaScript**, implementing **HTML5** best practices for superior user experience and responsiveness.

• Established RESTful services with solid documentation for internal and external stakeholders, ensuring clarity in the functioning of **Web API 2**.
• Conducted peer code reviews adhering to best practices, increasing overall code quality by 25% through constructive feedback loops.
• Maintained legacy systems while simultaneously developing new features, leading to a 15% increase in customer satisfaction ratings as measured by surveys.
